title: When Jordan Peterson's "program" works, and then it doesn't. What is lacking?
description:
Caleb got a randos slot nearly right out of the gate. I call it providence. Great talk. 

https://youtube.com/channel/UCjmJYdeecb5584InplTcRVQ

https://www.instagram.com/last_dance_unicorn/

Notes: 
Sheri Harkin's Group: Met a few times

Grew up full gospel, evangelical, lost of legalism, forced faith situations

Felt very purposeless

JBP about 2017/18 

Started to explore his faith again, through intellect first, rationalization first

By applying the principles in his first book from a brush with suicide into a highly selected film program,

Pursuing his career within a year

Difficulties with his film program, basically had to leave the program because of how they were handling COVID

Mono-myth stories

Binding of the blades, 5 volume book, 

Christopher Nolan's work, best in second or third watch. They get deeper and deeper. 

Seven levels of story telling, should gap from 7 to one

Like when non-Christian people take on Christianity in earnest. The gospel according to st. matthew

Gay director, very antagonistic towards the church

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Gospel_According_to_St._Matthew_(film) 

Estuary

Danny Voyles presents

Discord link. Good for just a few days. Check with more recent videos for a fresh link. https://discord.gg/zjRM74X3

Vanderklips channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX0jIcadtoxELSwehCh5QTg

My Substack https://paulvanderklay.substack.com/

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

All Amazon links here are part of the Amazon Affiliate Program. Amazon pays a small commission at no additional cost to you if you buy through one of the product links here. 

To support this channel/podcast on Paypal: https://paypal.me/paulvanderklay

To support this channel/podcast with Bitcoin (BTC): 37TSN79RXewX8Js7CDMDRzvgMrFftutbPo 
To support this channel/podcast with Bitcoin Cash (BCH) qr3amdmj3n2u83eqefsdft9vatnj9na0dqlzhnx80h 
To support this channel/podcast with Ethereum (ETH): 0xd3F649C3403a4789466c246F32430036DADf6c62

Powerpoints of Monologue videos are available for Patrons at https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay

Also on Lbry: https://lbry.tv/@paulvanderklay

Paul's Church Content at Living Stones Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh7bdktIALZ9Nq41oVCvW-A

To support Paul's work by supporting his church give here. https://tithe.ly/give?c=2160640
